recordTypes.name: Temporary Permits Application
recordTypes.description: Apply here for Firework, Tent, Propane, Hot Works, and Blasting permits.

recordTypes.name: Film/Photography/Drone Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this permit type to apply for permission to film or photograph at Town properties or facilities.  Drone film/photography permits are also available here.

recordTypes.name: Construction Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply here for all Fire Protection Equipment installation and/or modification permits.

recordTypes.name: Rental Permits
recordTypes.description:
This permit is intended for non-owner occupied rentals. This includes one and two family dwellings, multiple residencies, and mixed-use buildings. 
Note: Legal accessory apartments do not require this permit.

recordTypes.name: Accessory Dwelling Unit Permit
recordTypes.description:
Office Hours: Monday-Friday, 8:30a-4:30p. 631-351-3009.

RENEWAL APPLICATIONS, PLEASE FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS ON YOUR RENEWAL FORM. 
The Town of Huntington requires Accessory Dwelling Unit (formerly Accessory Apartment/mother-daughter) permits in owner-occupied single-family dwellings. Regardless of the occupancy of the apartment, whether it is for family use, being rented, for owner use, or is vacant, a valid permit must be obtained for the second kitchen. This special-use permit requires Zoning Board of Appeals approval. All new applications are subjected to a public hearing, bi-yearly inspections, and bi-yearly fees. Under town code, a saturation report is conducted on the parcel location of the application to insure regulation in the number of apartments in the area. There shall be no more than 10% or more of the lots within a one-half-mile radius of the application for which an ADU is present. Permit holders are subjected to conditions under town code.  
Under town code, NEW ADU applications are not permitted in basements/cellars/attics/or detached structures. Only one ADU per parcel of land is permitted.

recordTypes.name: Affordable Housing Formal Application
recordTypes.description: Please do not fill this out until you are notified to do so.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Appeals
recordTypes.description:
Use this application type for: Variances - When building or site plans have been denied; Special Exceptions - When required by the Zoning Code for certain uses; and Code Interpretations - (Denial from other agency not required)
Please note all attachments must be submitted as PDFs

recordTypes.name: Transfer of Density Flow Rights (TDFR)
recordTypes.description: Establishment of sanitary rights sending sites or redemption of flow credits on receiving sites in accordance with Suffolk County Department of Health Services regulations.

recordTypes.name: Snow Vendor Application

recordTypes.name: Solid Waste Collection License Application
recordTypes.description: This license is for businesses engaged in the collection, disposal and transport of solid waste within the Town of Huntington.  Deadline for submission is November 15th annually.

recordTypes.name: Tree Removal Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit type is used to receive and process tree removal permits.  Please refer to Town Code Chapter 186 for specific details.  Also, If an arborist or emergency personnel have deemed this an immediate hazard, please have them email planning@huntingtonny.gov for a possible expedited review and/or permit waiver.

recordTypes.name: Signs - Temporary Event and Grand Opening Sign Application
recordTypes.description: Use this record type to apply for temporary event signs including grand openings.  A temporary permit is required for any Commercial/Industrial utilized properties. Only (1) one Temporary permit can be issued per (2) two month period.  ONLY residential properties, real estate signs,  construction/development signs , and future business activity signs are EXEMPT.

categories.name: Highway Department
categories.content: Welcome to the Town of Huntington Highway Department.  Apply for the following permits/approvals below:

categories.name: Building and Housing
categories.content:
To submit an application for a permit online:

1) Select the type of permit needed by clicking the blue SELECT button. PLEASE carefully select the appropriate permit type before paying the NON-REFUNDABLE Application Fee.

2) Set up a "Citizen Service" Account, which will allow you access to your property information, tracking permit progress and status, and password protected secure payments for permits. This is required.

categories.name: Environmental Waste Management
categories.content:
To submit an application for a permit online:

1) Select the type of permit needed by clicking the blue SELECT button.

2) Set up a "Citizen Service" Account, which will allow you access to your license/permit information, track its progress and status, and password protected secure payments for permits. This is required.
